title: From the replica trick to the replica symmetry breaking technique. (arXiv:2211.01802v1 [physics.hist-ph])
description: Among the various remarkable contributions of Giorgio Parisi to physics, his formulation of the replica symmetry breaking solution for the Sherrington-Kirkpatrick model stands out. In this article, different historical sources are used to reconstruct the scientific and professional contexts of this prodigious advance.
dc:creator: Patrick Charbonneau
